org.drombler.commons.action.fx

Interface FXToggleAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventHandler<ActionEvent>, EventListener, FXAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActiveContextSensitiveFXToggleAction, AbstractApplicationContextSensitiveFXToggleAction, AbstractFXToggleAction, ToggleActionListenerAdapter

    public interface FXToggleAction
extends FXAction
    FXToggleAction keeps the state (enabled/ disabled, selected/ unselected etc.), the information (texts, image etc.) and the logic between menu items and toolbar buttons in sync.
    Author:
    puce
